name: Glow Shooter (Lexxn0x3)
description:
The game was made during a day. My original idea was to create an arcade like game (Asteroids). But I quickly decided during the development to make my own game concept with a few leanings to old arcade games. And I wanted the game to look more like a modern game with sort of arcade-style elements. And so this happened.

This is the first game I finished in a playable state. Probably because it isn't to complex.

I hope you enjoyed playing.

P.S. You should check out the Windows version. It has a lot of smaller delays and fewer lags.
